message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'd find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $95.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your suggestion. I am willing to pay $88 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $90.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I am able to offer $89 for the product.
